name: Emerald Star Company
description:
--DISCLAIMER--

This game is in very early development, and is not yet fully formed. Expect bugs and ideas that are not fully fleshed out or complete.

Note, for now there is almost no content, more is coming soon!

This game will be set in space, where you control a space ship. You must go around trading and mining to get resources to sell at a space station.

 You will also have to fend off space pirates and other criminals. They will have infiltrator modules which will latch on to your ship and burst a hole in the hull. You must close off the section of the ship that they have penetrated quickly or risk losing full cabin pressure. 

You will also have the ability to go into first person inside of your ship, on space stations and other people's outposts. You will have to enter first person to repair and upgrade your ship. This first person ability will also be used for combat against invading pirates.
